means: 增加，增大，增多( increase的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His increasing alignment with the Reagan administration nearly cost him re-election.
sentence.Network_cn: 与里根政府日益紧密的关系差点让他失去了连任的机会。

sentence.Network_en: They have hopes of increasing trade between the two regions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们希望增进两个地区之间的贸易。

sentence.Network_en: There is increasing polarization between the blacks and whites in the US.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国黑人和白人之间的分化在加剧。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 超全的英语短句汇集 - ξσ Dicky σξ - 博客园 ... incorrect 不正确 increasing 递增 increment 增量.
大学英语六级词汇真题练习题 ... ) descending 空间，位置的下降 ) increasing 增加的 ) defect 过失，缺点.
a growing number of 越来越多越来越：increasing如物价越来越高：The prices become increasingly high.
如何安度晚年 ... receded 退去 increasing 日益，不断 passionately 激昂地.

list.abs: primary increase 【植】初次增加 progressive increase 递增 speed increase 速度递增 standars Gibbs function increase (热学)标准吉布斯函数增加 statutory salary.
Hunters at an increased risk of infection if they skin an infected rabbit ., 猎人如果皮肤接触一只感染的兔子 , 其感染细菌的危险会升高.
字典中济字的解释 ... (11) 停;止[ stop] (12) 增加[ increase;add] (13) 弥补[ make up].
2011年中考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... include 包括 624. increase 增长 625. India 印度 626.

entry.def: If something increases or you increase it, it becomes greater in number, level, or amount.
If there is an increase in the number, level, or amount of something, it becomes greater.

example.ex: He called for an increase of 1p on income tax.
example.tran: 他呼吁所得税提高 1 便士。

entry.def: If something is on the increase, it is happening more often or becoming greater in number or intensity.

auth_sentence.content: Tree cover was decreasing while elephant numbers were increasing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tree cover was decreasing while elephant numbers were increasing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tree cover was decreasing while elephant numbers were increasing.

auth_sentence.content: These events are only increasing as our planet warms.
auth_sentence.res_content: These events are only increasing as our planet warms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These events are only increasing as our planet warms.

auth_sentence.content: He also blamed local Buddhist extremists for increasing tensions.
auth_sentence.res_content: He also blamed local Buddhist extremists for increasing tensions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also blamed local Buddhist extremists for increasing tensions.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"状态物品,行业等"; 2. 表介词,"在……情况下……"; 3. 表形容词,"正……的或令人……的"; 4. "……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
assume假装,假定+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.傲慢的,不逊的,僭越的
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
correspond通信;符合+ing……的→adj.相应的,通讯的
discriminate辨别,歧视+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有辨别能力的
encourage鼓励+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.鼓舞人心的
endure持久,持续+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.持久的,不朽的
engross吸引+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.引人入胜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: exceed超出+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人兴奋的,使人激动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: excite使兴奋+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.令人兴奋的,使人激动的
exhilarate使高兴+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.使人兴奋的
fascinate使……入迷+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.迷人的,吸引人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flatter阿谀,奉承+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
forego居先+ing……的→adj.在前的,前述的
hard艰难+work工作+ing……的→adj.苦干的,不辞辛劳的
increase增加+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.日益增加的,增大的
inspire鼓舞+ing令人……的→inspiring灌输的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest使发生兴趣,引起……的注意+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
invite邀请+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.诱人的,引人入胜的
out出+go走+ing正……的或令人……的→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
precede先于+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.在前的,前述的
promise允许,答应+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有希望的,有前途的
refresh使清新+ing令人……的→adj.使心神爽快的
rivet铆钉,固定+ing正……的或令人……的→如铆钉一样把人钉[吸引]住→非常精彩的
threaten恐吓,威胁+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.胁迫的,危险的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 欠缺的,没有的,不够格的
stems_affixes.word_buile: want想+ing……的→想要的→欠缺的
account计算+ing状态物品,行业等→n.会计学
advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
bank银行+ing状态物品,行业等→n.银行业
begin开始,首先+ing状态→n.开始
build建造+ing物→n.建筑[物],房屋,大楼 [同]structure
cloth布+ing物→n.服装,被褥
dance跳舞+ing状态物品,行业等→dancing舞蹈
engineer工程师+ing状态物品,行业等→n.工程[学]
feel感觉+ing状态→n.感情;心情;知觉;同情
fill填充+ing状态物品,行业等→n.充填物,馅
fish鱼+ing状态物品,行业等→n.钓鱼,捕鱼
floor地板+ing物→n.地板材料,铺地板

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立足处;稳固的地位,基础
stems_affixes.word_buile: foot足+ing状态物品,行业等→立足点
gloam变朦胧+ing状态物品,行业等→n.黄昏,薄暮
greet问候+ing状态物品,行业等→n.祝贺,问候
handwrite书法;笔迹+ing状态物品,行业等→n.笔迹,书写体,书法,笔势
happen发生+ing状态→n. 事件,意外发生的事
know知道+ing状态→n.知晓;认知
learn学习+ing状态物品,行业等→n.知识,学问;学习
leg腿+ing状态物品,行业等→legging绑腿
moor停船+ing状态物品,行业等→n.停泊处
open开+ing状态物品,行业等→n.开,开放,开始
shoe鞋+make制造+ing状态物品,行业等→n.制鞋修补皮鞋
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
proceed进行+ing正……的或令人……的→行动,进行
age年龄+ing状态→n.成熟,变老
consider考虑+ing在……情况下……→v. 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为; prep.鉴于,考虑到,顾及
fail错,失败+ing在……情况下……→prep.如果没有……
regard注视+ing在……情况下……→与……相关→关于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider考虑+ing在……情况下……→v. 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为; prep.鉴于,考虑到,顾及

Sentence.sentence: Some scientistsmaintain that the changes we are seeing fall within the range of random (无规律的) variation—some years are cold, others warm, and we have just had an unremarkable string of warm yearsrecently—but that is becoming an increasingly rare interpretation in the face of continued and increasing warm conditions.
E-books now account for 14 percent of all book sales in the country and are increasing far faster than overall book sales
In the US, for example, the popularity of computer activities is increasing.
In poor societies, people have children to improve their economic well-being by increasing the number of family workers and providing supports for parents in their old age.
During the 1980s he noticed an increasing number of long poems among the submissions, with some running to 70 or 80 pages.
